verses.arabic: الٓر ۚ تِلْكَ ءَايَـٰتُ ٱلْكِتَـٰبِ وَقُرْءَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: Alif, Lam, Ra. These are the verses of the Book and a clear Qur'an.
verses.hausa: A. L̃.R. Waɗancan ãyoyin littãfi ne da abin karantãwa mai bayyanãwa.

verses.arabic: رُّبَمَا يَوَدُّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ لَوْ كَانُوا۟ مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.english: Perhaps those who disbelieve will wish that they had been Muslims.
verses.hausa: Da yawa waɗanda suka kãfirta suke gũrin dã dai sun kasance Musulmi.

verses.arabic: ذَرْهُمْ يَأْكُلُوا۟ وَيَتَمَتَّعُوا۟ وَيُلْهِهِمُ ٱلْأَمَلُ ۖ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Let them eat and enjoy themselves and be diverted by [false] hope, for they are going to know.
verses.hausa: Ka bar su su ci kuma su ji dãdi, kuma gũri ya shagaltar da su, sa'an nan da sannu zã su sani.

verses.arabic: وَمَآ أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٌ مَّعْلُومٌ
verses.english: And We did not destroy any city but that for it was a known decree.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu halakar da wata alƙarya ba fãce tanã da littafi sananne.

verses.arabic: مَّا تَسْبِقُ مِنْ أُمَّةٍ أَجَلَهَا وَمَا يَسْتَـْٔخِرُونَ
verses.english: No nation will precede its term, nor will they remain thereafter.
verses.hausa: Wata al'umma bã ta gabãtar ajalinta, kuma bã zã su jinkirta ba.

verses.arabic: وَقَالُوا۟ يَـٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِى نُزِّلَ عَلَيْهِ ٱلذِّكْرُ إِنَّكَ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.english: And they say, "O you upon whom the message has been sent down, indeed you are mad.
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Yã kai wanda aka saukar da Ambato (Alƙur'ãni) a kansa! Lalle ne kai, haƙĩƙa, mahaukaci ne."

verses.arabic: لَّوْ مَا تَأْتِينَا بِٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ
verses.english: Why do you not bring us the angels, if you should be among the truthful?"
verses.hausa: "Dõmin me bã zã ka zo mana da malã'ĩku ba idan ka kasance daga mãsu gaskiya?"

verses.arabic: مَا نُنَزِّلُ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةَ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ وَمَا كَانُوٓا۟ إِذًا مُّنظَرِينَ
verses.english: We do not send down the angels except with truth; and the disbelievers would not then be reprieved.
verses.hausa: Bã Mu sassaukar da malã'iku fãce da gaskiya, bã zã su kasance, a wannan lõkacin, waɗanda ake yi wa jinkĩri ba.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا ٱلذِّكْرَ وَإِنَّا لَهُۥ لَحَـٰفِظُونَ
verses.english: Indeed, it is We who sent down the Qur'an and indeed, We will be its guardian.
verses.hausa: Lalle Mũ ne, Muka saukar da Ambato (Alƙur'ãni), kuma lal1e Mũ, haƙĩƙa, Mãsu kiyayẽwane gare shi.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا مِن قَبْلِكَ فِى شِيَعِ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: And We had certainly sent [messengers] before you, [O Muhammad], among the sects of the former peoples.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun aika Manzanni a cikin ƙungiyõyin farko, gabãninka.

verses.arabic: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن رَّسُولٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا۟ بِهِۦ يَسْتَهْزِءُونَ
verses.english: And no messenger would come to them except that they ridiculed him.
verses.hausa: Kuma wani Manzo bã ya zuwa gare su fãce sun kasance sunã mãsu, izgili a gare shi.

verses.arabic: كَذَٰلِكَ نَسْلُكُهُۥ فِى قُلُوبِ ٱلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: Thus do We insert denial into the hearts of the criminals.
verses.hausa: Kamar wancan ne Muke shigar da shi a cikin zukãtan mãsu laifi.

verses.arabic: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِۦ ۖ وَقَدْ خَلَتْ سُنَّةُ ٱلْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.english: They will not believe in it, while there has already occurred the precedent of the former peoples.
verses.hausa: Bã su yin ĩmãni da shi, kuma haƙĩƙa, hanyar mutãnen farko ta shige.

verses.arabic: وَلَوْ فَتَحْنَا عَلَيْهِم بَابًا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فَظَلُّوا۟ فِيهِ يَعْرُجُونَ
verses.english: And [even] if We opened to them a gate from the heaven and they continued therein to ascend,
verses.hausa: Kuma dã Mun bũɗe wata ƙõfa daga sama a kansu har suka wuni a ciki sunã tãkãwa.

verses.arabic: لَقَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا سُكِّرَتْ أَبْصَـٰرُنَا بَلْ نَحْنُ قَوْمٌ مَّسْحُورُونَ
verses.english: They would say, "Our eyes have only been dazzled. Rather, we are a people affected by magic."
verses.hausa: Lalle ne dã sun ce: "Abin sani kawai, an rufe idãnuwanmu ne. Ã'a, mũ mutãne ne waɗanda aka sihirce."

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ جَعَلْنَا فِى ٱلسَّمَآءِ بُرُوجًا وَزَيَّنَّـٰهَا لِلنَّـٰظِرِينَ
verses.english: And We have placed within the heaven great stars and have beautified it for the observers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa Mun sanya waɗansu masaukai a, cikin sama, kuma Muka ƙawãta ta ga masu kallo.

verses.arabic: وَحَفِظْنَـٰهَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْطَـٰنٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.english: And We have protected it from every devil expelled [from the mercy of Allah]
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka kiyãye ta daga dukan Shaiɗani wanda ake jĩfa.

verses.arabic: إِلَّا مَنِ ٱسْتَرَقَ ٱلسَّمْعَ فَأَتْبَعَهُۥ شِهَابٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.english: Except one who steals a hearing and is pursued by a clear burning flame.
verses.hausa: Fãce wanda ya sãci saurãre sai wutar yũlã bayyananniya ta bĩ shi.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْأَرْضَ مَدَدْنَـٰهَا وَأَلْقَيْنَا فِيهَا رَوَٰسِىَ وَأَنۢبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ شَىْءٍ مَّوْزُونٍ
verses.english: And the earth - We have spread it and cast therein firmly set mountains and caused to grow therein [something] of every well-balanced thing.
verses.hausa: Kuma ƙasa Mun mĩkẽ ta kuma Mun jẽfa duwãtsu tabbatattu a cikinta kuma Mun tsirar a cikinta, daga dukan abu wanda ake aunãwa da sikẽli.

verses.arabic: وَجَعَلْنَا لَكُمْ فِيهَا مَعَـٰيِشَ وَمَن لَّسْتُمْ لَهُۥ بِرَٰزِقِينَ
verses.english: And We have made for you therein means of living and [for] those for whom you are not providers.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka sanyã muku, a cikinta, abũbuwan rãyuwã da wanda ba ku zamã mãsu ciyarwa gare shi ba.

verses.arabic: وَإِن مِّن شَىْءٍ إِلَّا عِندَنَا خَزَآئِنُهُۥ وَمَا نُنَزِّلُهُۥٓ إِلَّا بِقَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.english: And there is not a thing but that with Us are its depositories, and We do not send it down except according to a known measure.
verses.hausa: Kuma bãbu wani abu fãce a wurinMu, akwai taskõkĩnsa kuma ba Mu saukar da shi ba fãce kan gwargwado sananne.

verses.arabic: وَأَرْسَلْنَا ٱلرِّيَـٰحَ لَوَٰقِحَ فَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ مَآءً فَأَسْقَيْنَـٰكُمُوهُ وَمَآ أَنتُمْ لَهُۥ بِخَـٰزِنِينَ
verses.english: And We have sent the fertilizing winds and sent down water from the sky and given you drink from it. And you are not its retainers.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka aika iskõki mãsu barbarar jũna sa'an nan Muka saukar da ruwa daga sama, sa'an nan Muka shãyar da ku shi, kuma ba ku zama mãsu taskacẽwa a gare shi ba.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّا لَنَحْنُ نُحْىِۦ وَنُمِيتُ وَنَحْنُ ٱلْوَٰرِثُونَ
verses.english: And indeed, it is We who give life and cause death, and We are the Inheritor.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Mu Muke rãyarwa, kuma Muke kashẽwa kuma Mũ ne magada.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَقْدِمِينَ مِنكُمْ وَلَقَدْ عَلِمْنَا ٱلْمُسْتَـْٔخِرِينَ
verses.english: And We have already known the preceding [generations] among you, and We have already known the later [ones to come].
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun san mãsu gabãta daga cikinku, kuma Mun san mãsu jinkiri.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ يَحْشُرُهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُۥ حَكِيمٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.english: And indeed, your Lord will gather them; indeed, He is Wise and Knowing.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Ubangijinka Shĩ ne Yake tãra su, lalle Shĩ ne Mai hikima, Masani.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
verses.english: And We did certainly create man out of clay from an altered black mud.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne Mun halicci mutum daga ƙeƙasasshiyar lãka, daga baƙin yumɓu wanda ya canja.

verses.arabic: وَٱلْجَآنَّ خَلَقْنَـٰهُ مِن قَبْلُ مِن نَّارِ ٱلسَّمُومِ
verses.english: And the jinn We created before from scorching fire.
verses.hausa: Kuma Aljani Mun haliccẽ shi daga gabãni, daga wutar iskar zafi.

verses.arabic: وَإِذْ قَالَ رَبُّكَ لِلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةِ إِنِّى خَـٰلِقٌۢ بَشَرًا مِّن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
verses.english: And [mention, O Muhammad], when your Lord said to the angels, "I will create a human being out of clay from an altered black mud.
verses.hausa: Kuma a lõkacin da Ubangijinka ya ce wa malã'iku: "Lalle Nĩ mai halittar wani jiki ne daga ƙẽƙasasshen yumɓu wanda ya canja."

verses.arabic: فَإِذَا سَوَّيْتُهُۥ وَنَفَخْتُ فِيهِ مِن رُّوحِى فَقَعُوا۟ لَهُۥ سَـٰجِدِينَ
verses.english: And when I have proportioned him and breathed into him of My [created] soul, then fall down to him in prostration."
verses.hausa: "To idan Na daidaitã shi kuma Na hũra daga RũhĩNa a cikinsa, to, ku fãɗi a gare shi, kunã mãsu yin sujada."

verses.arabic: فَسَجَدَ ٱلْمَلَـٰٓئِكَةُ كُلُّهُمْ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.english: So the angels prostrated - all of them entirely,
verses.hausa: Sai malã'iku suka yi sujada dukkansu gaba ɗaya.

verses.arabic: إِلَّآ إِبْلِيسَ أَبَىٰٓ أَن يَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.english: Except Iblees, he refused to be with those who prostrated.
verses.hausa: Fãce Iblĩs, ya ƙi kasancẽwa daga mãsu yin sujadar.

verses.arabic: قَالَ يَـٰٓإِبْلِيسُ مَا لَكَ أَلَّا تَكُونَ مَعَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.english: [Allah] said, O Iblees, what is [the matter] with you that you are not with those who prostrate?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Iblĩs mẽne ne a gare ka, ba ka kasance tãre da mãsu yin sujuda ba?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ لَمْ أَكُن لِّأَسْجُدَ لِبَشَرٍ خَلَقْتَهُۥ مِن صَلْصَـٰلٍ مِّنْ حَمَإٍ مَّسْنُونٍ
verses.english: He said, "Never would I prostrate to a human whom You created out of clay from an altered black mud."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ban kasance inã yin sujada ba ga mutum wanda Ka halicce shi daga bũsasshen yumɓun lãka wadda ta canja."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَٱخْرُجْ مِنْهَا فَإِنَّكَ رَجِيمٌ
verses.english: [Allah] said, "Then get out of it, for indeed, you are expelled.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "To, ka fita daga gare ta, dõmin lalle kai abin jĩfa ne."

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ ٱللَّعْنَةَ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ
verses.english: And indeed, upon you is the curse until the Day of Recompense."
verses.hausa: "Kuma lalle ne akwai la'ana a kanka har ya zuwa rãnar sakamako."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ فَأَنظِرْنِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.english: He said, "My Lord, then reprieve me until the Day they are resurrected."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangjĩna! Sai Ka yi mini jinkiri zuwa rãnar da ake tãshin su."

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّكَ مِنَ ٱلْمُنظَرِينَ
verses.english: [Allah] said, "So indeed, you are of those reprieved
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "To, lalle ne kanã daga waɗanda ake yi wa jinkiri."

verses.arabic: إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلْوَقْتِ ٱلْمَعْلُومِ
verses.english: Until the Day of the time well-known."
verses.hausa: "Zuwa ga Yinin Lõkacin nan sananne."

verses.arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَآ أَغْوَيْتَنِى لَأُزَيِّنَنَّ لَهُمْ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ وَلَأُغْوِيَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: [Iblees] said, "My Lord, because You have put me in error, I will surely make [disobedience] attractive to them on earth, and I will mislead them all
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Yã Ubangijina! Inã rantsuwa da abin da Ka ɓatar da ni da shi, haƙĩƙa inã ƙawãta musu (rãyuwa) a cikin ƙasã kuma haƙĩƙa inã ɓatar da su gabã ɗaya."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا عِبَادَكَ مِنْهُمُ ٱلْمُخْلَصِينَ
verses.english: Except, among them, Your chosen servants."
verses.hausa: "Fãce bãyinKa daga gare su, waɗanda Ka tsarkake."

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰذَا صِرَٰطٌ عَلَىَّ مُسْتَقِيمٌ
verses.english: [Allah] said, "This is a path [of return] to Me [that is] straight.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Wannan tafarki ne a gare Ni, madaidaici."

verses.arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِى لَيْسَ لَكَ عَلَيْهِمْ سُلْطَـٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلْغَاوِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, My servants - no authority will you have over them, except those who follow you of the deviators.
verses.hausa: "Lalle ne bãyĩNa, bã ka da ĩkõ a kansu, fãce wanda ya bĩ ka daga ɓatattu."

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ لَمَوْعِدُهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: And indeed, Hell is the promised place for them all.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle Jahannama ce haƙĩƙa, ma'a1kawartarsu gabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: لَهَا سَبْعَةُ أَبْوَٰبٍ لِّكُلِّ بَابٍ مِّنْهُمْ جُزْءٌ مَّقْسُومٌ
verses.english: It has seven gates; for every gate is of them a portion designated."
verses.hausa: Tanã da ƙõfõfi bakwai, ga kõwace ƙõfa akwai wani juz'i daga gare su rababbe.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ ٱلْمُتَّقِينَ فِى جَنَّـٰتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.english: Indeed, the righteous will be within gardens and springs.
verses.hausa: Lalle mãsu taƙawa sunã a cikin gidãjen Aljanna mai idandunan ruwa.

verses.arabic: ٱدْخُلُوهَا بِسَلَـٰمٍ ءَامِنِينَ
verses.english: [Having been told], "Enter it in peace, safe [and secure]."
verses.hausa: "Ku shigẽ ta da aminci, kunã amintattu."

verses.arabic: وَنَزَعْنَا مَا فِى صُدُورِهِم مِّنْ غِلٍّ إِخْوَٰنًا عَلَىٰ سُرُرٍ مُّتَقَـٰبِلِينَ
verses.english: And We will remove whatever is in their breasts of resentment, [so they will be] brothers, on thrones facing each other.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka ɗẽbe abinda ke a cikin zukãtansu na daga ƙullin zũci, suka zama 'yan'uwa a kan gadãje, sunã mãsu fuskantar junã.

verses.arabic: لَا يَمَسُّهُمْ فِيهَا نَصَبٌ وَمَا هُم مِّنْهَا بِمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.english: No fatigue will touch them therein, nor from it will they [ever] be removed.
verses.hausa: Wata wahala bã zã ta shãfe su bã a cikinta kuma ba su zama mãsu fita daga, cikinta ba.

verses.arabic: نَبِّئْ عِبَادِىٓ أَنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ
verses.english: [O Muhammad], inform My servants that it is I who am the Forgiving, the Merciful.
verses.hausa: Ka bai wa bãyiNa lãbari cẽwa lalle ne Ni, Mai gãfarane, Mai jin ƙai.

verses.arabic: وَأَنَّ عَذَابِى هُوَ ٱلْعَذَابُ ٱلْأَلِيمُ
verses.english: And that it is My punishment which is the painful punishment.
verses.hausa: Kuma azãbãTa ita ce azãba mai raɗaɗi.

verses.arabic: وَنَبِّئْهُمْ عَن ضَيْفِ إِبْرَٰهِيمَ
verses.english: And inform them about the guests of Abraham,
verses.hausa: Kuma ka bã su lãbãrin bãƙin Ibrãhĩm.

verses.arabic: إِذْ دَخَلُوا۟ عَلَيْهِ فَقَالُوا۟ سَلَـٰمًا قَالَ إِنَّا مِنكُمْ وَجِلُونَ
verses.english: When they entered upon him and said, "Peace." [Abraham] said, "Indeed, we are fearful of you."
verses.hausa: A lõkacin da suka shiga gunsa, sai suka ce: "Sallama." Ya ce: "Lalle mũ, daga gare ku, mãsu firgita ne."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ لَا تَوْجَلْ إِنَّا نُبَشِّرُكَ بِغُلَـٰمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.english: [The angels] said, "Fear not. Indeed, we give you good tidings of a learned boy."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Kada ka firgita. Lalle ne mũ, munã yi makabushãra game da wani yãro masani."

verses.arabic: قَالَ أَبَشَّرْتُمُونِى عَلَىٰٓ أَن مَّسَّنِىَ ٱلْكِبَرُ فَبِمَ تُبَشِّرُونَ
verses.english: He said, "Have you given me good tidings although old age has come upon me? Then of what [wonder] do you inform?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Shin kun bã ni bushãra ne a kan tsũfa yã shãfe ni? To, da me kuke bã ni bushara?"

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَشَّرْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ فَلَا تَكُن مِّنَ ٱلْقَـٰنِطِينَ
verses.english: They said, "We have given you good tidings in truth, so do not be of the despairing."
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Munã yi maka bushãra da gaskiya ne, sabõda haka, kada da kasance daga mãsu yanke tsammãni."

verses.arabic: قَالَ وَمَن يَقْنَطُ مِن رَّحْمَةِ رَبِّهِۦٓ إِلَّا ٱلضَّآلُّونَ
verses.english: He said, "And who despairs of the mercy of his Lord except for those astray?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Kuma wãne ne yake yanke tsammãni daga rahamar Ubangijinsa, fãce ɓatattu?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ فَمَا خَطْبُكُمْ أَيُّهَا ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.english: [Abraham] said, "Then what is your business [here], O messengers?"
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "To, mẽne ne babban al'amarinku? Yã kũ manzanni!"

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّآ أُرْسِلْنَآ إِلَىٰ قَوْمٍ مُّجْرِمِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Indeed, we have been sent to a people of criminals,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Lalle ne mũ, an aika mu zuwa ga wasu mutãne mãsu laifi."

verses.arabic: إِلَّآ ءَالَ لُوطٍ إِنَّا لَمُنَجُّوهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: Except the family of Lot; indeed, we will save them all
verses.hausa: "Fãce mutãnen Lũɗu, lalle ne mũ, haƙĩƙa, mãsu tsĩrar dasu ne gabã ɗaya."

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱمْرَأَتَهُۥ قَدَّرْنَآ ۙ إِنَّهَا لَمِنَ ٱلْغَـٰبِرِينَ
verses.english: Except his wife." Allah decreed that she is of those who remain behind.
verses.hausa: "Fãce mãtarsa mun ƙaddara cẽwa lalle ne ita, haƙĩƙa, tanã daga mãsu halaka."

verses.arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ءَالَ لُوطٍ ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.english: And when the messengers came to the family of Lot,
verses.hausa: To, a lõkacin da mazannin suka jẽ wa mutãnen Lũɗu,

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّكُمْ قَوْمٌ مُّنكَرُونَ
verses.english: He said, "Indeed, you are people unknown."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne ku mutãne ne waɗanda ba a sani ba."

verses.arabic: قَالُوا۟ بَلْ جِئْنَـٰكَ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ فِيهِ يَمْتَرُونَ
verses.english: They said, "But we have come to you with that about which they were disputing,
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ã'a, mun zo maka sabõda abin da suka kasance sunã shakka a cikinsa."

verses.arabic: وَأَتَيْنَـٰكَ بِٱلْحَقِّ وَإِنَّا لَصَـٰدِقُونَ
verses.english: And we have come to you with truth, and indeed, we are truthful.
verses.hausa: "Kuma mun zo maka da gaskiya. Kuma lalle ne mũ, haƙĩƙa, mãsu gaskiya ne."

verses.arabic: فَأَسْرِ بِأَهْلِكَ بِقِطْعٍ مِّنَ ٱلَّيْلِ وَٱتَّبِعْ أَدْبَـٰرَهُمْ وَلَا يَلْتَفِتْ مِنكُمْ أَحَدٌ وَٱمْضُوا۟ حَيْثُ تُؤْمَرُونَ
verses.english: So set out with your family during a portion of the night and follow behind them and let not anyone among you look back and continue on to where you are commanded."
verses.hausa: "Sai ka yi tafiya da iyãlinka, a wani yanki na dare, kuma ka bi bãyansu, kuma kada wani daga cikinku ya yi waiwaye, kuma ku bi ta inda aka aumurce ku."

verses.arabic: وَقَضَيْنَآ إِلَيْهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْأَمْرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقْطُوعٌ مُّصْبِحِينَ
verses.english: And We conveyed to him [the decree] of that matter: that those [sinners] would be eliminated by early morning.
verses.hausa: Kuma Muka hukunta wancan al'amarin zuwa gare shi cẽwa lalle ne ƙarshen waɗancan abin yankẽwa ne a lõkacin da suke mãsu shiga asuba.

verses.arabic: وَجَآءَ أَهْلُ ٱلْمَدِينَةِ يَسْتَبْشِرُونَ
verses.english: And the people of the city came rejoicing.
verses.hausa: Kuma mutãnen alƙaryar suka je sunã mãsu bushãra.

verses.arabic: قَالَ إِنَّ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ ضَيْفِى فَلَا تَفْضَحُونِ
verses.english: [Lot] said, "Indeed, these are my guests, so do not shame me.
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Lalle ne waɗannan bãƙĩna ne, sabõda haka kada ku kunyata ni."

verses.arabic: وَٱتَّقُوا۟ ٱللَّهَ وَلَا تُخْزُونِ
verses.english: And fear Allah and do not disgrace me."
verses.hausa: "Kuma ku bi Allah da taƙawa, kuma kada ku sanya ni a baƙin ciki."

verses.arabic: قَالُوٓا۟ أَوَلَمْ نَنْهَكَ عَنِ ٱلْعَـٰلَمِينَ
verses.english: They said, "Have we not forbidden you from [protecting] people?"
verses.hausa: Suka ce: "Ashe ba mu hana ka daga tãlikai ba?"

verses.arabic: قَالَ هَـٰٓؤُلَآءِ بَنَاتِىٓ إِن كُنتُمْ فَـٰعِلِينَ
verses.english: [Lot] said, "These are my daughters - if you would be doers [of lawful marriage]."
verses.hausa: Ya ce: "Ga waɗannan, 'ya'yãna idan kun kasance mãsu aikatãwa ne."

verses.arabic: لَعَمْرُكَ إِنَّهُمْ لَفِى سَكْرَتِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.english: By your life, [O Muhammad], indeed they were, in their intoxication, wandering blindly.
verses.hausa: Rantsuwa da rãyuwarka! Lalle ne sũ a cikin mãyensu sunã ta ɗĩmuwa.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُشْرِقِينَ
verses.english: So the shriek seized them at sunrise.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan tsãwa ta kãma su, sunã mãsu shiga lõkacin hũdõwar rãnã.

verses.arabic: فَجَعَلْنَا عَـٰلِيَهَا سَافِلَهَا وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِمْ حِجَارَةً مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.english: And We made the highest part [of the city] its lowest and rained upon them stones of hard clay.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan Muka sanya samanta ya kõma ƙasanta, kuma Muka yi ruwan duwãtsu na lãkar wuta a kansu.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَـٰتٍ لِّلْمُتَوَسِّمِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that are signs for those who discern.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wancan akwai ãyõyi ga mãsu tsõkaci da hankali.

verses.arabic: وَإِنَّهَا لَبِسَبِيلٍ مُّقِيمٍ
verses.english: And indeed, those cities are [situated] on an established road.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne ita, haƙĩƙa sunã a gẽfen wata hanyã tabbatacciya.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ فِى ذَٰلِكَ لَـَٔايَةً لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Indeed in that is a sign for the believers.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne a cikin wancan akwai ãyã ga mãsu ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَإِن كَانَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْأَيْكَةِ لَظَـٰلِمِينَ
verses.english: And the companions of the thicket were [also] wrongdoers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne ma'abũta Al'aika sun kasance, haƙĩƙa, mãsu zãlunci!

verses.arabic: فَٱنتَقَمْنَا مِنْهُمْ وَإِنَّهُمَا لَبِإِمَامٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.english: So We took retribution from them, and indeed, both [cities] are on a clear highway.
verses.hausa: Sai Muka yi azãbar rãmuwã a gare su, kuma lalle sũ biyun, haƙĩƙa, sunã a gẽfen wani tafarki mabayyani.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ كَذَّبَ أَصْحَـٰبُ ٱلْحِجْرِ ٱلْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.english: And certainly did the companions of Thamud deny the messengers.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa ma'abũta Hijiri sun ƙaryata Manzanni.

verses.arabic: وَءَاتَيْنَـٰهُمْ ءَايَـٰتِنَا فَكَانُوا۟ عَنْهَا مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.english: And We gave them Our signs, but from them they were turning away.
verses.hausa: Kuma Kuka kai musu ãyõyinMu, sai suka kasance mãsu bijirẽwa daga gare su.

verses.arabic: وَكَانُوا۟ يَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ ٱلْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا ءَامِنِينَ
verses.english: And they used to carve from the mountains, houses, feeling secure.
verses.hausa: Kuma sun kasance sunã sassaƙa gidãje daga duwãtsu, alhãli sunã amintattu.

verses.arabic: فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّيْحَةُ مُصْبِحِينَ
verses.english: But the shriek seized them at early morning.
verses.hausa: Sai tsãwa ta kãma su sunã mãsu shiga asuba.

verses.arabic: فَمَآ أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.english: So nothing availed them [from] what they used to earn.
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan abin da suka kasance sunã tsirfantãwa bai wadãtar ga barinsu ba.

verses.arabic: وَمَا خَلَقْنَا ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٰتِ وَٱلْأَرْضَ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَآ إِلَّا بِٱلْحَقِّ ۗ وَإِنَّ ٱلسَّاعَةَ لَـَٔاتِيَةٌ ۖ فَٱصْفَحِ ٱلصَّفْحَ ٱلْجَمِيلَ
verses.english: And We have not created the heavens and earth and that between them except in truth. And indeed, the Hour is coming; so forgive with gracious forgiveness.
verses.hausa: Kuma ba Mu halicci sammai da ƙasa da abin da yake a tsakãninsu ba fãce da gaskiya. Kuma lalle ne Sã'a (Rãnar Alƙiyãma) haƙĩƙa mai zuwa ce. Sabõdahaka ka yi rangwame, rangwame mai kyau.

verses.arabic: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ هُوَ ٱلْخَلَّـٰقُ ٱلْعَلِيمُ
verses.english: Indeed, your Lord - He is the Knowing Creator.
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Ubangijinka, shi ne Mai yawan halitta, Masani.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ ءَاتَيْنَـٰكَ سَبْعًا مِّنَ ٱلْمَثَانِى وَٱلْقُرْءَانَ ٱلْعَظِيمَ
verses.english: And We have certainly given you, [O Muhammad], seven of the often repeated [verses] and the great Qur'an.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne, haƙĩƙa, Mun bã ka bakwai waɗanda ake maimaita karatunsu da Alƙur'ãni mai girma.

verses.arabic: لَا تَمُدَّنَّ عَيْنَيْكَ إِلَىٰ مَا مَتَّعْنَا بِهِۦٓ أَزْوَٰجًا مِّنْهُمْ وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَٱخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.english: Do not extend your eyes toward that by which We have given enjoyment to [certain] categories of the disbelievers, and do not grieve over them. And lower your wing to the believers
verses.hausa: Kada lalle kaƙĩƙa idãnunka biyu zuwa ga abin da Muka jiyar da su dãɗi game da shi, nau'i-nau'i a gare su, kuma kada ka yi baƙin ciki a kansu, kuma sassauta fikãfikanka ga mãsu ĩmãni.

verses.arabic: وَقُلْ إِنِّىٓ أَنَا ٱلنَّذِيرُ ٱلْمُبِينُ
verses.english: And say, "Indeed, I am the clear warner" -
verses.hausa: Kuma ka ce: "Lalle nĩ nĩ ne mai gargaɗi bayyananne."

verses.arabic: كَمَآ أَنزَلْنَا عَلَى ٱلْمُقْتَسِمِينَ
verses.english: Just as We had revealed [scriptures] to the separators
verses.hausa: Kamar yadda Muka saukar a kan mãsu yin rantsuwa,

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ جَعَلُوا۟ ٱلْقُرْءَانَ عِضِينَ
verses.english: Who have made the Qur'an into portions.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suka sanya Alƙur'ãni tãtsuniyõyi.

verses.arabic: فَوَرَبِّكَ لَنَسْـَٔلَنَّهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.english: So by your Lord, We will surely question them all
verses.hausa: To, rantsuwa da Ubangijinka! Haƙĩƙa, Munã tambayarsugabã ɗaya.

verses.arabic: عَمَّا كَانُوا۟ يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.english: About what they used to do.
verses.hausa: Daga abin da suka kasance sunã aikatãwa.

verses.arabic: فَٱصْدَعْ بِمَا تُؤْمَرُ وَأَعْرِضْ عَنِ ٱلْمُشْرِكِينَ
verses.english: Then declare what you are commanded and turn away from the polytheists.
verses.hausa: Sai ka tsage gaskiya game da abin da ake umurnin ka kuma ka kau da kai daga masu shirki.

verses.arabic: إِنَّا كَفَيْنَـٰكَ ٱلْمُسْتَهْزِءِينَ
verses.english: Indeed, We are sufficient for you against the mockers
verses.hausa: Lalle ne Mũ Mun isar maka daga mãsu izgili.

verses.arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَجْعَلُونَ مَعَ ٱللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا ءَاخَرَ ۚ فَسَوْفَ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.english: Who make [equal] with Allah another deity. But they are going to know.
verses.hausa: Waɗanda suke sanyãwar wani abin bautãwa na dabam tare da Allah, sa'an nan da sannu zã su sani.

verses.arabic: وَلَقَدْ نَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ يَضِيقُ صَدْرُكَ بِمَا يَقُولُونَ
verses.english: And We already know that your breast is constrained by what they say.
verses.hausa: Kuma lalle ne haƙĩƙa Munã sanin cẽwa lalle kai, ƙirjinka yanã yin ƙunci game da abin da suke faɗã (na izgili).

verses.arabic: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَكُن مِّنَ ٱلسَّـٰجِدِينَ
verses.english: So exalt [Allah] with praise of your Lord and be of those who prostrate [to Him].
verses.hausa: Sabõda haka ka yi tasbĩhi game da gõde wa Ubangijinka, kuma ka kasance daga mãsu sujada.

verses.arabic: وَٱعْبُدْ رَبَّكَ حَتَّىٰ يَأْتِيَكَ ٱلْيَقِينُ
verses.english: And worship your Lord until there comes to you the certainty (death).
verses.hausa: Kuma ka bauta wa Ubangijinka, har mutuwa ta zo maka.
